line_1: And all the Ills of broken Faith avert;
line_2: Whilst YOU the Right of Liberty assert,

line_1: But from this frighted glance thy form avert,
line_2: Or guilt sits heavy on thy lab'ring heart;

line_1: A maiden old, kind heaven avert;
line_2: The blood runs chill about my heart,

line_1: To expel the traitors and their schemes avert;
line_2: And now behold them eager and alert
